plurals.name: title_other_input_methods
plurals.item: Whalǝr ʻYa ko pu Suyere Damwa

string.name: title_add_keyboard
string.comment: Add a new keyboard

string.name: title_languages_settings
string.comment: List of installed languages

string.name: title_language_settings
string.comment: Keyman Settings for a language

string.name: label_add
string.comment: Button to add an item

string.name: label_back
string.comment: Button to go back

string.name: label_cancel
string.comment: Button to cancel an action

string.name: label_close
string.comment: Close a dialog

string.name: label_close_keyman
string.comment: Close the Keyman application

string.name: label_forward
string.comment: Button to go forward

string.name: label_next_input_method
string.comment: Switch to next input method (replaces label_close_keyman)

string.name: label_download
string.comment: Button to confirm downloading an item

string.name: label_install
string.comment: Confirmation to install a package

string.name: label_later
string.comment: Do an action at a later time

string.name: label_next
string.comment: Go to the next screen

string.name: label_ok
string.comment: Button to acknowledge a dialog

string.name: label_update
string.comment: Dialog button to update a resource

string.name: no_internet_connection
string.comment: Internet connection missing

string.name: cannot_connect
string.comment: Error message when network connection fails

resources.string: Adi ata mǝzi ɓui ka lukwa Keyman server wɛ!

string.name: confirm_delete_keyboard
string.comment: Confirmation to delete a keyboard

resources.string: Gada bara ɗlǝba ka ɗalba kibod ǝni ya?

string.name: confirm_download_keyboard
string.comment: Confirmation to download a keyboard update

resources.string: Gada bara download vershon nam ɓǝlin nǝr kibod ǝni ya?

string.name: confirm_update
string.comment: Confirmation to update several resources

resources.string: Gada bara ka update kibodyere ba and dictionariyere kulini ya?

string.name: keyboard_updates_available
string.comment: Notification when resource updates are available

resources.string: Updateyere Nǝr Sǝr Kǝthlǝr Nam Adai

string.name: update_available
string.comment: Currently installed version of a resource with an available update

string.name: keyboard_update_message
string.comment: language name: keyboard name

string.name: keyboard_version
string.comment: Label for keyboard version

string.name: help_link
string.comment: Label for help link

string.name: uninstall_keyboard
string.comment: Label for uninstalling keyboard

string.name: keyboard_picker_new_keyboard
string.comment: Mark a language name that's newly installed in keyboard list

string.name: keyboard_qr_code
string.comment: QR Code description

resources.string: Skanba code ǝni akuya ka gǝ vu ǝni akwa\nkeyboard divais damwa

string.name: welcome_package
string.comment: Title to welcome.htm page (name and version)

string.name: fileprovider_undefined
string.comment: FileProvider library needed to view help file

resources.string: Gada bara library nǝr FileProvider akuyaka gǝ wul su akwa fail nǝr dlarɛ: %1$s

string.name: fatal_keyboard_error
string.comment: Fatal keyboard error (keyboard ID::packageID for language). Will load default keyboard

resources.string: Fatal keyboard error with %1$s:%2$s for %3$s language. Loading default keyboard.

string.name: fatal_keyboard_error_short
string.comment: Error in keyboard (keyboard ID::packageID for language).

resources.string: Su kura kal kalakwa kibod %1$s:%2$s nǝr %3$s nya.

string.name: query_associated_model
string.comment: Check if there's an available dictionary to download

resources.string: Ata kǝra chakǝnta akuyaka ɓui suyere tara tsukwar bwar dictionary kadǝbar ka ndǝ download ko sǝgǝl akǝr

string.name: cannot_query_associated_model
string.comment: Cannot reach server to check if there's an available dictionary to download

resources.string: Gadiyata mǝzi bui sava nǝr Keyman wɛ akuya ka gǝ bui ka sǝgǝl aka jiliyir dikshinari namtǝ gada bara.

string.name: confirm_download_model
string.comment: Confirmation to download a dictionary update

resources.string: Gada bara download vershon nam ɓǝlin nǝr kibod ǝni ya?

string.name: no_associated_model
string.comment: Confirmation there's no available dictionary to download

resources.string: Dictionary adiwɛ akuya ka ndǝ download

string.name: catalog_unavailable
string.comment: Notification that the cloud resource catalog can't be updated

string.name: catalog_download_start_in_background
string.comment: Notification that the resource catalog update will begin

resources.string: Update nǝr Katalog badicini akwa background

string.name: catalog_download_is_running_in_background
string.comment: Notification that the resource catalog update is still downloading

resources.string: Katalogari tsu ata kǝra downloading; usɛ ɓǝla dzakti nkǝrti aɦǝla saka nkiɗu laka kadwam!

string.name: progress_message_checking_resource_is_running
string.comment: Progress notification that the check for a resource is still running

resources.string: Ata kǝra chakǝnta ka bara sǝr ampaniyere wato resource

string.name: keyboard_download_start_in_background
string.comment: Notification that a keyboard download has started

string.name: keyboard_download_is_running_in_background
string.comment: Notification that a keyboard download is still running

resources.string: Kibodnamtǝ gǝ tsarba ata kǝra downloading; usɛ dzakti nkǝrti kadawm aɦǝla saka nkiɗu laka!

string.name: keyboard_download_finished
string.comment: Notification that a keyboard download has finished

string.name: dictionary_download_start_in_background
string.comment: Notification that a dictionary download has started

string.name: dictionary_download_is_running_in_background
string.comment: Notification that a dictionary download is still running

resources.string: Kibod namtǝ gǝ tsarba ata kǝra downloading; usɛ dzakti nkǝrti kadawm aɦǝla saka nkiɗu laka!

string.name: dictionary_download_finished
string.comment: Notification that a dictionary download has finished

string.name: download_failed
string.comment: Notification that a download failed

string.name: failed_to_retrieve_file
string.comment: Failed to retrieve downloaded file

resources.string: Ta ɓui ka download fail wɛ

string.name: update_check_unavailable
string.comment: Error message when a Keyman server can't be reached

resources.string: Ta ɓui ka lukwa server wɛ!

string.name: update_check_current
string.comment: Notification that all resources are up to date

resources.string: "Shanga suyere nam adai ani up to date!"

string.name: update_failed
string.comment: Notification that a resource update failed

resources.string: Duku akwa ko hang ta ǝniyere ngǝlata ʻya update!

string.name: update_success
string.comment: Notification that a resource update successfully updated

resources.string: Sǝr kǝthlǝryere nam adai kǝ ʻya update kal kal!

string.name: model_version
string.comment: Title for a dictionary version

string.name: uninstall_model
string.comment: Label to uninstall a dictionary

string.name: confirm_delete_model
string.comment: Confirmation to delete a dictionary

resources.string: Gada bara kǝlba ka ɗalba dictionary ǝni ya?

string.name: model_deleted
string.comment: Notification when a dictionary is deleted

string.name: keyboard_install_toast
string.comment: Notification when a keyboard is installed

string.name: keyboard_deleted_toast
string.comment: Notification when a keyboard is deleted

string.name: enable_corrections
string.comment: Enable corrections from the suggestion banner

resources.string: Mǝrti ka dza mǝzi ʻyati ka dzǝ dzukti suwar su wato correctionyere

string.name: enable_predictions
string.comment: Enable predictions from the suggestion banner

string.name: check_available_model
string.comment: Check for available dictionary

resources.string: Baraba ka zǝndi dictionary nam adai

string.name: check_model_online
string.comment: Check for dictionaries online

resources.string: Wulba ka gǝ bui dikshinariyere akwa layir shambar

string.name: model_info_header
string.comment: Dictionary name

string.name: model_picker_header
string.comment: Dictionaries for a specified language

string.name: model_install_toast
string.comment: Notification when a dictionary is installed

resources.string: Dictionary namtǝ ndǝ vu ko hau

string.name: default_locale
string.comment: Use the device's current locale

string.name: label_delete
string.comment: Confirmation to delete an item

resources.string: Tsukwar vi ǝni akuya ka gǝ pali kibod

string.name: unable_to_open_browser
string.comment: Notification when a browser activity cannot be launched

resources.string: Yar ta mǝzi ka mburnta brauza wɛ
